subject: Personal Finance
title: The Debt Jubilee
description: A 1-minute de-risking session on The Debt Jubilee.

hook.text: Ancient Babylon had a rule: every 49 years, all debts were forgiven. A total reset.

buildup.text: Debt jubilees prevented inequality from spiraling out of control in ancient societies.

discovery.text: When debts grew too large, farmers lost their land and became slaves. Jubilees reversed this.

twist.text: Modern student loan forgiveness debates echo the same ancient tension between creditors and debtors.
